meanings.sent1: After playing outside, I need to rewash my dirty clothes.
meanings.sent2: I always rewash the dishes before putting them away.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally rewashed the same load of laundry twice!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a gentle rewashing of my worries.
meanings.sent5: The rain rewashed the streets, leaving them sparkling clean.

meanings.sent1: Don't forget to rewash the car after it rains.
meanings.sent2: I will rewash the windows to make sure they are spotless.
meanings.sent3: He had to rewash his hands after touching the muddy dog.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to rewash the canvas to start over.
meanings.sent5: The river rewashed the pebbles, revealing their vibrant colors.
